name: Alone in the Dark (Binus Game Development Club)
name_original: Alone in the Dark (Binus Game Development Club)
description:
A lonely person that is cooped up in his own fantasy world, but loneliness haunts the little guy making him imagine that nightmarish being in the dark, to stop it he tried to go outside for once but he can't as he is afraid of the outside world more than the nightmare eating his conscious bit by bit.
You, the player play the part to be his light thru the place and help him escape.
This game was developed and made possible by Binus Game Development Club.
Controls:
W, A, S, D -> Walk.
Space -> Jump.

Left-Shift -> Sprint.

Left-Ctrl -> Crouch.
Enter -> Continue Dialogue / QTE Click.

Esc -> Pause Menu / Skip Dialogue.

E -> Open Door.

Space -> Skip Credits.
Credits:

Angeline Cecilia - Team Manager
Reynald Sentosa - Programmer
